name: Inventory & Order Tracker
description: Helps supply chain analysts quickly find inventory status, order information, shipment tracking, and supply chain exceptions across documentation and reports.

friction_addressed.description: Collecting data from multiple systems and reports to find inventory and order status
Monitoring inventory levels across locations and identifying exceptions
Switching between multiple systems and documents to piece together supply chain status

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster access to inventory status, order information, and supply chain exceptions
secondary_benefits: Reduced context-switching between systems and documents
Quicker response to status inquiries from stakeholders
Easier identification of supply chain issues
Consolidated view of supply chain information

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to inventory reports, order logs, shipment tracking documents, and exception reports
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) inventory reports and snapshots, (2) order tracking documents, (3) shipment logs, (4) exception and alert reports

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to ERP or WMS systems via Graph connectors for more current data
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for SAP, Oracle, or other supply chain systems

optional.name: Email
optional.reason: Can search email for order confirmations, shipment notifications, and supplier communications
optional.setup_instructions: Enable if analysts receive supply chain updates via email

actions.description: This agent retrieves and surfaces information but does not modify inventory levels, orders, or system data.

conversation_starters.title: Inventory status
conversation_starters.text: What's the current inventory level for [SKU/product]?

conversation_starters.title: Order lookup
conversation_starters.text: Find the status of order [order number]

conversation_starters.title: Shipment tracking
conversation_starters.text: Where is the shipment from [supplier] that was supposed to arrive [date]?

conversation_starters.title: Low stock alerts
conversation_starters.text: Which items are below safety stock right now?

conversation_starters.title: Backorder status
conversation_starters.text: What orders are currently on backorder?

conversation_starters.title: Supplier deliveries
conversation_starters.text: What deliveries are expected from [supplier] this week?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder containing inventory reports
Access to order tracking documents and logs
Microsoft 365 Copilot license for users who will use the agent

data_not_accessed: Live ERP/WMS data (unless Graph connector configured)
Pricing and cost data (unless in tracked documents)
admin_considerations: Data freshness depends on how often reports are exported to SharePoint
Consider automated exports from ERP to keep documents current
Align SharePoint permissions with data sensitivity
